https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cp9U5DcvyhXAIo3YkRwzXprKEiH.jpg The story revolves around five people who are enjoying their life in Kochi. Indrajith Sukumaran plays a creative ad director; Remya Nambeesan as Veena plays a trained dancer; Nivin Pauly plays a waiter at a cafe; Prathap Pothen plays a psychologist; and Lena Abhilash plays the head of a corporation. Arikil Oraal
